text: Propilidium lissocona is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lepetidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== Propilidium lissocona can be found between 30.98°N to 25°N and 81°W to 79.64°W at depths of 155 to 538 meters.http://www.malacolog.org/search.php?nameid=119 ==References== Category:Lepetidae Category:Gastropods described in 1927
title: Propilidium lissocona
